page.title: 08Fathers' Employment
page.content: {In Mayfield most fathers work at factories in the area.} These include J.C.B., Bayliss Precision, Mayfield Yarns, Dove Valley Poultry and the local quarries. They do jobs like store keeping,packing,welding and machine maintenance.About 15% of the fathers are lorry drivers,mainly working for Charcon,Tilcon and Tarmac.A similar number work in the building trade doing joinery,double-glazing and brick laying.Roughly 10% of fathers are professionals or office workers,for example teachers,surveyors,managers or company representatives.Three fathers work on farms but the rest fall into a variety of categories.We have a policeman,prison officer,mobile caterer and a publican.{ Luckily only two out of seventy fathers are unemployed.}
